resources.string: ONE store provides the license service (Application License Checker, ALC) to enable you to apply the license policy in your applications.\n With the ALC service, you can check in real-time if customers using the app have a valid license, and then determine whether additional use is appropriate.
Purchase history does not exist.\nWould you like to buy from One Store?

ONE store login is required.\nDo you want to try again?
ONE store service installation is required.\nDo you want to download it?
Unknown error.\nPlease contact ONE store.\nDo you want to try again?
